subject: Re: [junit] HotSpot Virtual Machine Error.
msgSnippet: This was supposed to be fixed in 1.4.0_02 but in the comments at the bottom it says i get this problem even with j2se1.4.1! . Maybe try with 1.4.0_02 and see
messageBody:
This was supposed to be fixed in 1.4.0_02 but in the comments at the
bottom it says "i get this problem even with j2se1.4.1!". Maybe try
with 1.4.0_02 and see if it works.

Could it be this bug?
http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/bugParade/bugs/4703771.html

Go through Java Developer Connection - Forums, u'll find lot of
material there.

Thanks,
Parag



--- Vikas Malla <malla6um@...> wrote:
>
> I use ant task <batchtest> to run a series of tests for my
> application. Off late, I have been getting the following error that
> causes my tests to fail, that is, this error is generated during the
> execution of my tests. A typical scenario is that first 6 test run
> fine, and the seventh test has this problem which makes the test to
> fail. And all the following tests fail as well.
>
> [java] #
>
> [java] # HotSpot Virtual Machine Error, Internal Error
>
> [java] # Please report this error at
>
> [java] # http://java.sun.com/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi
>
> [java] #
>
> [java] # Error ID: 47454E45524154452F4F502D41500E4350500842
>
> [java] #
>
> [java] # Problematic Thread: prio=5 tid=0x8a44e68 nid=0x6c0 runnable
>
> [java] #
>
> [java] Java Result: 1
>
>
>
> Any suggestions.
>
> TIA,
>
> Vikas
>
>
>
>
